short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Give the Chromium Issue Tracker the old Monorail favicon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The favicon for the new Chromium Issue Tracker is the same as chromium.org. This makes it hard to see at a glance which of your tabs are open to Chromium bugs. The old Monorail icon was unique and easy to see, so install this extension to get it back!
